text:
@HC_Richardson I guess I'll answer this seriously.

1) Trump didn't want to acknowledge that the coronavirus was a problem. The Republicans knew that a pandemic would be disastrous for the economy, the markets, and his reelection. Fox News was downplaying coronavirus (mainly) for those reasons.
